00019 #ifndef SORTEDCHUNKLIST_HPP
00020 #define SORTEDCHUNKLIST_HPP
00021 
00022 #include "chunk.hpp"
00023 #include "../CoreUtils/vector.hpp"
00024 #include <stack>
00025 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00026 
00027 namespace isis
00028 {
00029 namespace data
00030 {
00031 namespace _internal
00032 {
00033 
00034 /*
00035  * This class sorts the inserted chunks by the given properties while construction.
00036  * The rules of the sorting depends on the upper level using these chunkLists later on.
00037  * See the special classes, e.g. MRImage to find details about sorting criterias.
00038  */
00039 class SortedChunkList
00040 {
00041 public:
00042     struct scalarPropCompare {
00043         util::PropertyMap::KeyType propertyName;
00044         scalarPropCompare( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType &prop_name );
00045         bool operator()( const util::PropertyValue &a, const util::PropertyValue &b ) const;
00046     };
00047     struct posCompare {
00048         bool operator()( const util::fvector4 &a, const util::fvector4 &b ) const;
00049     };
00050     struct chunkPtrOperator {
00051         virtual boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> operator()( const boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &ptr ) = 0;
00052         virtual ~chunkPtrOperator();
00053     };
00054 private:
00055     typedef std::map<util::PropertyValue, boost::shared_ptr<Chunk>, scalarPropCompare> SecondaryMap;
00056     typedef std::map<util::fvector4, SecondaryMap, posCompare> PrimaryMap;
00057 
00058     std::stack<scalarPropCompare> secondarySort;
00059     posCompare primarySort;
00060     PrimaryMap chunks;
00061 
00062     // low level finding
00063     boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> secondaryFind( const util::PropertyValue &key, SecondaryMap &map );
00064     SecondaryMap *primaryFind( const util::fvector4 &key );
00065 
00066     // low level inserting
00067     std::pair<boost::shared_ptr<Chunk>, bool> secondaryInsert( SecondaryMap &map, const Chunk &ch );
00068     std::pair<boost::shared_ptr<Chunk>, bool> primaryInsert( const Chunk &ch );
00069 
00070     std::list<util::PropertyMap::KeyType> equalProps;
00071 public:
00072 
00073     //initialisation
00077     SortedChunkList( util::PropertyMap::KeyType comma_separated_equal_props );
00078 
00083     void addSecondarySort( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType &cmp );
00084 
00085     // utils
00086 
00088     void transform( chunkPtrOperator &op );
00089 
00091     bool insert( const Chunk &ch );
00092 
00094     bool isEmpty()const;
00095 
00097     void clear();
00098 
00100     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> > getLookup();
00101 
00103     bool isRectangular();
00104 
00106     size_t getHorizontalSize();
00107 };
00108 
00109 
00110 }
00111 }
00112 }
00113 
00114 #endif // SORTEDCHUNKLIST_HPP
